'Add global subroutines
Sub CheckPath_Startup
' Check SD path SD_PathS_Startup = Check("\SDCard") USB1_PathS_Startup = Check("\USBDisk") USB2_PathS_Startup = Check("\USBDisk2")
End Sub
Function Check(path As String) As Boolean Return System.IO.Directory.Exists(path) End Function
Sub Machine_Def
End Sub
